Parameters.Name: IsDefault
Parameters.Description: Controls if this workload zone will be set as the default. If true, missing required parameters will be allowed.

Parameters.Name: subscription
Parameters.Description: IMPORTANT: please provide a subscription id to enable dropdown functionality for various arm id parameters, such as resourcegroup_arm_id, network_arm_id, etc.

Parameters.Name: environment
Parameters.Description: Identifier for the workload zone, used for partitioning the environments. For example 'DEV', 'QA', 'PROD', 'TEST', etc.

Parameters.Name: location
Parameters.Description: The Azure region in which to deploy.

Parameters.Name: save_naming_information
Parameters.Description: If defined, will create a naming information json file for the resources, see custom naming.

Parameters.Name: name_override_file
Parameters.Description: If provided,defines a json formatted file defining the name overrides, see custom naming.

Parameters.Name: resourcegroup_name
Parameters.Description: Overrides the name of the resource group that will be provisioned.

Parameters.Name: resourcegroup_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Azure resource identifier for existing resource group.

Parameters.Name: automation_username
Parameters.Description: Defines the user account used by the automation. This account will be the account used for logging on to the virtual machines.

Parameters.Name: automation_password
Parameters.Description: Defines the password for the automation user. If empty, Terraform will create a password and persist it in key vault

Parameters.Name: automation_path_to_public_key
Parameters.Description: Used to provide a path to an existing ssh public key file. If empty, Terraform will create the ssh key and persist it in key vault

Parameters.Name: automation_path_to_private_key
Parameters.Description: Used to provide a path to an existing ssh private key file. If empty, Terraform will create the ssh key and persist it in key vault

Parameters.Name: network_logical_name
Parameters.Description: Defines the workload virtual network logical name. Used in the naming convention.

Parameters.Name: network_name
Parameters.Description: If provided, the name of the Virtual network. Only use this if the default naming is not sufficient.

Parameters.Name: network_address_space
Parameters.Description: Virtual network address space. Ensure sufficient size for all the workload Virtual machines and other network resources.

Parameters.Name: network_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing virtual network.

Parameters.Name: use_private_endpoint
Parameters.Description: Defines if the key vaults and storage accounts have private endpoints.

Parameters.Name: use_service_endpoint
Parameters.Description: Defines if the key vaults and storage accounts use service endpoints.

Parameters.Name: peer_with_control_plane_vnet
Parameters.Description: Defines if the SAP VNet will be peered with the control plane VNet

Parameters.Name: enable_firewall_for_keyvaults_and_storage
Parameters.Description: Defines if access to the key vaults and storage accounts is restricted to the SAP and deployer VNets

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Defines the admin subnet name, should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable.

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_address_prefix
Parameters.Description: Defines the subnet address range for the admin subnet.

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use as the admin subnet.

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default admin network security group name is not acceptable.

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use.

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_address_prefix
Parameters.Description: Defines the subnet address range for the database subnet.

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use for the database subnet.

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default database network security group name is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use.

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable.

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_address_prefix
Parameters.Description: Defines the subnet address range for the application subnet.

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use for the application subnet.

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default application network security group name is not acceptable.

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use.

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_address_prefix
Parameters.Description: Defines the subnet address range for the web subnet.

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use for the web subnet.

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default web network security group name is not acceptable.

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use

Parameters.Name: iscsi_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet for the iSCSI subnet

Parameters.Name: iscsi_subnet_address_prefix
Parameters.Description: Defines the subnet address range for the iSCSI subnet.

Parameters.Name: iscsi_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable.

Parameters.Name: iscsi_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use.

Parameters.Name: iscsi_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable for the network security group name

Parameters.Name: anf_subnet_address_prefix
Parameters.Description: Defines the subnet address range for the ANF subnet.

Parameters.Name: anf_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use for ANF subnet.

Parameters.Name: anf_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable.

Parameters.Name: anf_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group.

Parameters.Name: anf_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable for the network security group name

Parameters.Name: use_custom_dns_a_registration
Parameters.Description: Boolean value indicating if a custom dns a record should be created when using private endpoints

Parameters.Name: management_dns_subscription_id
Parameters.Description: Subscription for the DNS zone, if different from the management subscription

Parameters.Name: management_dns_resourcegroup_name
Parameters.Description: Resource group for the DNS zone, if different from the SAP Library resource group

Parameters.Name: NFS_provider
Parameters.Description: Defines how NFS services are provided to the SAP systems: AFS (Azure Files for NFS), ANF (Azure NetApp Files), NFS (custom solution)

Parameters.Name: transport_volume_size
Parameters.Description: Defines the size of the transport volume.

Parameters.Name: ANF_account_name
Parameters.Description: The name for the Netapp Account to create.

Parameters.Name: ANF_account_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Azure resource identifier for an existing Netapp Account

Parameters.Name: ANF_service_level
Parameters.Description: The service level for the NetApp pool

Parameters.Name: ANF_pool_size
Parameters.Description: The pool size in TB for the NetApp pool.

Parameters.Name: ANF_qos_type
Parameters.Description: The Quality of Service type of the pool (Auto or Manual).

Parameters.Name: ANF_use_existing_pool
Parameters.Description: Use existing storage pool.

Parameters.Name: ANF_pool_name
Parameters.Description: the NetApp capacity pool name (if any)

Parameters.Name: user_keyvault_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies the Azure resource identifier for an existing key vault designed to host secrets for the administrative users.

Parameters.Name: spn_keyvault_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies the Azure resource identifier for an existing key vault. Designed to host the deployment credentials used by the automation.

Parameters.Name: enable_purge_control_for_keyvaults
Parameters.Description: Disables the purge protection for Azure key vaults

Parameters.Name: additional_users_to_add_to_keyvault_policies
Parameters.Description: Additional users (object IDs) to add to the key vault policies.

Parameters.Name: dns_label
Parameters.Description: Provides the DNS label to use for the Virtual Network.

Parameters.Name: dns_resource_group_name
Parameters.Description: Provides the name of the resource group hosting the Private DNS zone

Parameters.Name: utility_vm_count
Parameters.Description: Defines number of utility virtual machines to deploy. The utility virtual machines can be used to host SAPGui and other tools.

Parameters.Name: utility_vm_size
Parameters.Description: Defines the size for the utility virtual machine. Default size is Standard_D4ds_v4.

Parameters.Name: utility_vm_useDHCP
Parameters.Description: Defines if Azure subnet provided IP addresses should be used for the utility virtual machines.

Parameters.Name: utility_vm_image_offering
Parameters.Description: Defines the virtual machine image to use for the utility virtual machines.

Parameters.Name: utility_vm_image
Parameters.Description: Defines the virtual machine image to use for the utility virtual machines.

Parameters.Name: utility_vm_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the utility virtual machines.

Parameters.Name: install_volume_size
Parameters.Description: The volume size in GB for the transport share

Parameters.Name: install_storage_account_id
Parameters.Description: Azure Resource Identifier for the Installation media storage account.

Parameters.Name: install_private_endpoint_id
Parameters.Description: Azure Resource Identifier for a private endpoint for the installation storage account.

Parameters.Name: diagnostics_storage_account_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Azure resource id for the diagnostics storage account

Parameters.Name: witness_storage_account_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Azure resource id for the witness storage account

Parameters.Name: transport_storage_account_id
Parameters.Description: Azure Resource Identifier for the Transport media storage account.

Parameters.Name: transport_private_endpoint_id
Parameters.Description: Azure Resource Identifier for a private endpoint connection for the transport storage account.
